entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 70 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
